settings.text:
VICTILES Return And Refund Policy

Thanks for shopping at www.victiles.com.au

If you are not entirely satisfied with your purchase, we’re here to help.

15 Days Return

You have 15 calendar days to return an item from the date you received it. If returned items less than 3 boxes, generally it is not worth to return it because of the restock fee.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it.

35% Handling Charge

A handling charge of 35% will be charged on the value of all returns and 15% on the full value of all orders cancelled. 

14 Days Refund

If your return is approved, we will initiate a refund either to your credit card or via EFT within 14 days. Refunds under $100.00 may be given within our retail stores.

Shipping

If you have been sent the wrong product or if the product is faulty then VICTILES will arrange shipping for the return of the goods. Otherwise, you will be responsible for the return of items for any other reason.

Contact Us

If you have any questions on how to return your item to us, contact us at sales@victiles.com.au or on 0430 390 656.
